section.section:
This subsection does not apply to members of:
the State Police Retirement System;
the Teachers' Pension System; or
the Teachers' Retirement System.
If a member is unable to apply, the member's department head may complete and submit an application to the Board of Trustees for the member.
This subsection applies to a member of the State Police Retirement System.
This subsection does not prevent an officer from exercising rights granted under § 21-111(b) of this article.

This subsection applies to members of:
the Teachers' Pension System; and
the Teachers' Retirement System.
If a member is unable to apply, the member's State or county superintendent may complete and submit an application to the Board of Trustees for the member.
